verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Just hours before President Donald Trump 's scheduled commencement speech at the United States Naval Academy graduation ceremony on Friday] , [ARG0: two Navy vets] [V: lambasted] [ARG1: the president] [ARG2: as a " coward and a liar "] [ARGM-TMP: while encouraging the graduates in attendance to ignore everything he says] .

Just hours before President Donald Trump 's scheduled commencement speech at the United States Naval Academy graduation ceremony on Friday , [ARG0: two Navy vets] lambasted the president as a " coward and a liar " while [V: encouraging] [ARG1: the graduates in attendance] [ARG2: to ignore everything he says] .
